short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Isolate zoom functionality to individual tabs when working with multiple tabs on the same domain

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension was created to assist TTB members address the current default Chrome browser setting where all tabs sharing the same domain share the same zoom functionality.

This extension isolates page zoom settings to target only your current tab regardless of whether that tab shares the same domain with another. Simply enable the extension to see this desired result.
